content: This baseball team from New York is famous for its rivalry with the Boston Red Sox and for winning the World Series in 2009. The team is called the "New York" what?

This baseball team from New York is famous for its rivalry with the Boston Red Sox and for winning the World Series in 2009. The team is called the "New York" what?

I believe the team you're referring to is the New York Yankees. They have a long-standing rivalry with the Boston Red Sox, and they did win the World Series in 2009. The Yankees are one of the most successful and well-known teams in Major League Baseball history.
